title: Terrific looking n162 Caruthers PSA 3 available - card sold!

posts.post_title: Terrific looking n162 Caruthers PSA 3 available - card sold!
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Brian McQueen
Gorgeous card and I'd hate to part with it but gotta pay for Mastro winnings somehow [IMG]https://www.net54baseball.com/images/happy.gif[/IMG]

Very little wear on the card at all.  Nice, glossy, virtually flawless surface with no creasing or wrinkling anywhere.  Very slight corner wear is all that really keeps this card at a "3".  The back is mostly clean and entirely damage free as well.  

Asking $625 delivered or would accept partial trade as well.  Any questions, feel free to ask!

***Card has been sold.  Thank you for the inquiries***

-Brian
